title: Child injured in accidental shooting
content:
ESCAMBIA COUNTY, Fla. (WEAR) —
A child has been taken to receive medical treatment after being accidentally shot in the leg, according to Escambia authorities.
The Escambia County Sheriff's Office say that a firearm was accidentally discharged at a home on 49th Avenue Monday night.
The bullet then struck the child in the leg.
The child was transported to a hospital for treatment of non life-threatening injuries.
Authorities are still actively investigating the incident.
